title: [CANCEL] WTB Mathewson SGC Portrait, White & Dark Cap

posts.post_title: [CANCEL] WTB Mathewson SGC Portrait, White & Dark Cap
posts.post_content:
[CANCEL]

Looking for SGC versions of all three of Christy's T206 cards:

Portrait
White Cap
Dark Cap

Want Nice-for-Grade examples, they will be on display in my Home Office.

Budgeting $800 each for the three cards.

Please send scans to my email:

[url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve
